name: Send data to an HTTP endpoint when records are updated in Airtable
description: Streamline your data management process by automatically sending updates from Airtable to your desired endpoint. With this template, every time a record is updated in Airtable, Make will trigger an action to send the relevant data to an HTTP endpoint of your choice. This integration ensures that your data remains synchronized and up-to-date across platforms, enhancing your workflow efficiency and reducing manual data entry.
